website_summaries.verdict: Off the charts when it comes to classy, contemporary appeal, but it's not suitable to wear during any activities that could compromise the strap.
pros: Sports rose gold-tone accents, which contrasts handsomely with the black dial and strap
Pairs nicely with almost any outfit, from casual to formal looks
cons: Strap is made of polyurethane, which looks good but isn't quite as durable as leather or metal

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: If you want plenty of compliments on your watch then this is a must have in the collection. Fair price and durable. Way more compliments than my watches that cost $600-$1000
customer_reviews.author: Jay Clay

customer_reviews.title: Amazing watch, don't let the size turn you away!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch, have gotten 8 compliments on it in 2 days already. It is larger than most but looks great, not tacky like some oversized watches do. Still getting used to wearing it, but if you regularly wear watches it'll be fine. Has a good solid weight to it but not overly heavy. The band is high quality for rubber and I like the color!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Nice but weakkk band
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch but the band ripped within weeks. Had to pay another 20 bucks for new band.
customer_reviews.author: SabSab

customer_reviews.title: !The Champ Is Here!
customer_reviews.text: Luxury meet versitle! Soft silicone straps with a real nice diamond pattern embroidery on the inside, luminous hands to see even after a late night out. That aside the rose gold on this piece are subtle & make it pop because of the rich navy face of the bezel. Absolutely captivating easy to read dials and even easier to set up time & date. What I'm finding out more about this watch is it so comfortable, versitle, it could be a potential daily use from date night to just hanging out. If your skeptical about purchasing put those to rest! It's a legit Michael kors watch & you can't go wrong with the pricing on it. Enjoy the pics 😸
customer_reviews.author: Street☆ChemistTop Contributor: Watches

customer_reviews.title: The box was bad and small
customer_reviews.text: The watch was nice and as described! The packing was bad came in a small box sqezzed in. We brought it as a gift and ended up removing it from the box putting it in another gift box and gave the box seprately...!
customer_reviews.author: anshu k singh

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Damaged
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the watch. I bought this for my hubby and it came in on time but it was damaged inside. I was out of town for a while and didn't know that it arrived damaged since i had left it as a surprise for hubby before i left for my trip out of state. The return/exchange time was for 30 days and was over by the time i had come back. Spoke to the seller and they were not able to help me out in this case. However, Amazon was kind of to offer me a refund and now I ordered it again. Otherwise, Its a beautiful watch!
customer_reviews.author: EYM

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking watch and functional
customer_reviews.text: It's a very nice looking watch. It can be worn for causal and business events. Be aware though, it's a big face watch and at least for me the band is kind of stiff and it hurts the bone on my wrist after time. That is the only reason I didn't give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: TheTallDriver

customer_reviews.title: ~The Michael Kors MK8184: Classic, Stylish, and Versatile~
customer_reviews.text: This Michael Kors watch is probably my favorite watch ever! The contrast between the Rose Gold stainless steel that frames the face of the watch and the black rubber strap is striking without looking cheap or flashy. Also, I love the heaviness and comfort of the watch. I've owned and have worn the watch regularly for 1.5 years now and the acrylic crystal dial window remains scratch-free. It's versatile enough to wear with casual wear or a suit and tie. I've received numerous compliments from acquaintances and strangers alike. If you like what you see, purchase without reservation.
customer_reviews.author: LuKasAV6

customer_reviews.title: A conversation starter!
customer_reviews.text: Best watch ever! So stylish. It looks great on my boyfriend and he loved it when he got it for Christmas! He's a big watch guy and his fairies color is blue, so when he got this he couldn't be happier. The look on his face was worth it. It comes in the original case, with price tag. It's a beautiful piece that makes any outfit look great. It's a big show stopper. My boyfriend gets a lot of compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Yesenia M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent watch
customer_reviews.text: The watch is very well put together and stylish. I like the rubber wrist band over a leather one for the fact that I can wear it in the shower. When it gets wet, I just rub off the water with a towel and it's dry. Great gold color against the black face really stands out. It could for formal and casual occasions. The watch feels heavy, you can feel the weight on your arm but that's okay, I would rather have one that felt sturdy/solid than something cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Great looking watch.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the watch but had to return it due to its size. This is a great looking watch and is a little bit bigger then I thought it would be based on the pictures. I have a smaller wrist and when the size of the watch and the silicone band it was just too large on my wrist...other then that I would have kept the watch.
customer_reviews.author: Eric R. Gatlin

customer_reviews.title: This looks and feels like a much more expensive watch
customer_reviews.text: This watch is stunning, even more so than the images can depict. Looks and feels very high quality, definitely an eye-catcher. I own several watches, a few very expensive models. This looks and feels like a much more expensive watch. In terms of size, I'm an athletic guy and it's just the right size for me. If you have small wrists this is not the watch for you.
customer_reviews.author: D&BP

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice, if you like black and gold colors, it’s light weight and fits perfect any size
customer_reviews.author: Angelo D.

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch with the exception of the band. The band is a soft plastic material.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: 5 years and still kicking!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best watches I ever had, more than 5 years, daily use, 1 battery change, and this watch works like a charm, I'm considering getting the same exact watch, what a great surprise!
customer_reviews.author: Leprekaun

customer_reviews.title: Careful
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, the only thing was this was purchased under the women’s category. I didn’t realize that til I received it. But I also didn’t pay attention to the title says men’s . I was searching for a woman’s watch and this popped up. So I guess I bought myself a new watch instead of for my wife.
customer_reviews.author: Excellent customer service. Good product

customer_reviews.title: it is now my favorite to wear
customer_reviews.text: This is indeed a well made and high styled watch....it is now my favorite to wear. Feels great on my wrist also. I recommend this MK to anyone who appreciates high style and solid craftsmanship at reasonable prices. Awesome watch indeed!!!

customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for someone, seems to be a nice watch however when I opened the box the watch seemed fine but the metal was smudged. It doesn't appear to be damaged just a little dirty which was sad because I spent so much money on it.

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this!

customer_reviews.title: Best Gift Ever
customer_reviews.text: Recently purchased watch for the boyfriend and he loved it . He was super excited. Great packaging and color

customer_reviews.title: It would be useful if the strap could be easily changed as well

This is the second one I've bought and I have to say that the only drawback is the strap and the fact that the plastic holes tend to get worn after repeated wear. It would be useful if the strap could be easily changed as well.

customer_reviews.title: elegant watch makes you feel rich!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is made of quality materials and looks a million times better than the picture. I am very satisfied and id recommend. The rubber strap is comfortable and the watch overall has a nice weight to it. I like bigger watches and this one is perfect for me. The price is amazing considering my wife bought me this watch for Christmas from Macy's for $225. I returned that watch and bought it here through amazon for a fraction of the price.

I love the large dial top but it might not be for everyone. I don't think you will be disappointed if you grab one. The black color looks nice too.

It is a good idea to buy it here because you are saving a lot for the same exact watch! This watch is BOLD and people just can't help looking at it/ complimenting him on it. The only two concerns he voiced is 1) the face is a little big and 2) he's not sure what to match it with. Other than that it is a great watch and I love the way it looks on him!

product_meta.title: Michael Kors Dylan Stainless Steel Chronograph Watch
product_meta.description:
* Watch Sizing Guide
 * Embellish your style with this wonderfully eye-catching Michael Kors™ timepiece.
 * Rose gold-tone stainless steel case.
 * Adjustable polyurethane strap with buckle closure.
 * Luminous three-hand analog display with quartz movement, three sub-dials and date display window.
